Package ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor.communication.legendEvent

Package providing classes for communication of legend events.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LegendAlignmentEvent
    An action for modifying the alignment of a legend.
    LegendBackgroundColorEvent
    An action for modifying the background color of a legend.
    LegendBorderColorEvent
    An action for modifying the border color of a legend.
    LegendEvent
    A legend event.
    LegendItemEvent
    A legend item event.
    LegendItemFontFamilyEvent
    An action for modifying the legend item font family.
    LegendItemFontSizeEvent
    An action for modifying the legend item font size.
    LegendItemFontStyleEvent
    An action for modifying the legend item font style.
    LegendItemShowSwatchEvent
    An action for modifying the visibility of a swatch of a legend.
    LegendItemSwatchColorEvent
    An action for modifying the swatch color of a legend.
    LegendItemTextColorEvent
    An action for modifying the text color of a legend.
    LegendItemTextEvent
    An Action for modifying the text of a legend.
